summary.p: Searches an input string for an occurrence of a regular expression and returns whether it produces at least one match.

syntax.code: REGEX_MATCH(text AS string, pattern AS string) RETURNS bool

param.name: text
param.p: The string to search for a match.

param.name: pattern
param.p: The regular expression used to produce a match.

returns.p: If pattern produces at least one match in text the return value is TRUE. Otherwise it is FALSE.
